hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah narrated that:Allah's Messenger (S) said: "The most virtuous fasting after the month of Ramadan is that of Allah's month of Al-Muharram. And the most virtuous Salat after the obligatory is the night prayer

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي فَضْلِ صَلاَةِ اللَّيْلِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Virtue Of Salat During The Night
